column5: Well it seems spring is upon us once again.geese are already showing up and the shoreline ice is slowly starting to slip away.Can still get on ice in some places but have some great spots I can get into good walleye bites from shore now.always love this time of the year.Winter ice fishing was once again top notch and our weather was pretty favourable.Seems like ice will be going a little earlier this year so that will be good all around for all fish to get to spawn out and those fisherman that come up on the opener.Hope your all booked into your favourite places and have a great time in our awesome country.

One that I've had for 32 consecutive years by being in NW Ontario for the walleye opener. Same for October as I make it for Thanksgiving about 35% of the years.It's made my life better. And possibly longer.
Getting geared up for the opener on Cedar. Thanks for the early ice out notice! That helps me plan our first spots to hit. Hope to see you there!
its a great great place for sure.went out tonight with a buddy and had a blast catching walleyes from shore.little cooler here tonight my guides were freezing up the last hour.
Had a blast !! See you tonight.
